name: Trader Woes
description: McCoy's Maquis contacts have traced the stolen Enterprise shuttle to Ferenginar. Join Sulu and Uhura on an undercover mission on Ferenginar to locate the missing shuttle and Garth.
rules:
— Unique Federation, Ferengi Alliance, and Maquis Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using Uhura, H. Sulu, Ishka, Garth, or TOS Bridge Crew (TOS Spock, Chapel, Kirk, McCoy, Scotty, Chekov, Rand) will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
— Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Uhura, H. Sulu, Ishka, Garth, or TOS Bridge Crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

next_threshold_rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

screens.text: "Captain. I've been asked to inform you that Doctor McCoy's contacts in the Maquis have traced the missing shuttle to Ferenginar. Would you join Lieutenant Uhura and I on an undercover mission to find the shuttle? It would be of great help."
"Hopefully I won't need this phaser, Captain, but the Ferengi are not known for being particularly cordial to women. I need to be prepared for anything."
"We can do this by the book, using Starfleet procedures; we can barter with the Ferengi for information; or, we can work from the shadows with the Maquis. What say you, Captain?"
